title: Menu Merchant Search Filters
description: Filter criteria to narrow menu merchant search results. All specified filters combine with AND logic.

category.description: Filter by merchant category. Categories are merchant-defined strings representing merchant taxonomy.

open_now.description: Whether the merchant is open at request time.

fulfillment_method.description: Required fulfillment method type for the merchant.

location.description: Filter by location using address fields and an optional radius. Partial matches are implementation-defined.

radius.description: Optional distance radius from the reference address.
